sentences.english: Rivals have been routed so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，蘋果的競爭對手都潰不成軍。

sentences.english: Expensive to maintain, though, only the wealthiest states can afford them.
sentences.chinese: 憲兵騎士維護費用高昂，只有富庶國家方有財力成軍。

sentences.english: But the American newspaper's business model appears to be broken.
sentences.chinese: 但美國報業的經營模式似乎已經潰不成軍。

sentences.english: When the free and easy defeated retreat, the only sensitive to the laughter.
sentences.chinese: 當灑脫潰不成軍節節敗退時，只剩下敏感在狂笑。

sentences.english: A fool in love battle be utterly routed.
sentences.chinese: 傻瓜纔在愛情戰役裏潰不成軍。

sentences.english: From its beginnings, in the wake of punk - rock, U2 made music on a grand scale .
sentences.chinese: 在龐克搖滾後成軍的U2，製作音樂的格局很大。

sentences.english: In Cheng Jun after 8 years, team of day dragon secret service receives new job.
sentences.chinese: 在成軍8年後，天龍特工隊接到新的任務。
